sentences.en: But the retrusion of alveolar mandible led to chin protrusion.

sentences.en: Conclusion It's practical to utilize human mandible as the model to measure retentive force of clasps.
sentences.cn: 采用具有天然牙列的离体下颌骨作为测定卡环固位力的模型是可行的.

sentences.en: Conclusions CAMRS could reproductively and effectively reposition mandible with little sleeping disturbance.
sentences.cn: 结论新研制的CAMRS系统运行稳定有效,对睡眠干扰小.

sentences.en: Gingiva, chin, lip, check and mandible are the most commonly injuried sites.
sentences.cn: 下颌骨骨折最常见.软组织伤多见于龈 、 颏 、 唇 、 颊.

sentences.en: Impacted anterior teeth due to a small mandible.
Mandible fracture appears most frequently and the highest is chin fracture.
sentences.cn: 骨折分布以下颌骨骨折最为常见,其中颏部骨折发病率最高,合并伤中以上颌骨及颧骨、颧弓骨折最多.

sentences.en: Objective: Indirect trauma to the mandible may cause injury of the TMJs.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立一种新的闭合性的间接性颞下颌关节创伤动物模型.

sentences.en: The lower mandible could not move backward.

sentences.en: There is no long , mandible of lower jaw in the whale.

sentences.en: There is no long, slender mandible of lower jaw in the whale.
sentences.cn: 沿水面飞行的类似海鸥的水鸟, 细长的下颚浸入水中觅食.

sentences.en: They are tongue, lips, pharynx, mandible, and velum.

sentences.en: To analyse stress state of mandible pulled by masticatory muscles.
